title: Himi 431
lyrics:
7.7.7.7. loua
(Ko Matiu 13:31)
1.
Pule’anga ‘o e Lang
i
,
Ko e ha nai ha tatau
Te tau fokotu’u ki ai,
Hono ivi lahi fau?
Ha tenga’i mūsita pē,
Iki ‘i he iki fau;
Ki’i momo’i tenga ē
Tupu ko e fu’u akau.
2.
Si’i ‘akau ka fākatu’a,
Anga pē ke pukupuk
u
,
‘Ikai pē ke maʻolunga,
‘Alu pē mo e mohuk
u
.
‘Iloange kuo va’a,
‘Alu ‘o holofa lah
i
;
Ha’u he manu he ‘atā
‘O nau nofo pē ki ai.
3.
Anga ‘o e lotu ia
Hono fua fokotu’u
He na’e fai ha toke’ia,
Pe ha ‘amanaki tup
u
?
Hake ‘i ha ki’i fonua,
Langa ‘e ha tokosi’i,
‘O hapai pe ‘e he tu’a,
‘Ikai kau ai ‘a houʻeik
i
.
4.
Ka ko eni kuo a’u
He fonua fulipē;
‘Oku tu’u kaukaua fau,
Pā pē ki he langi ē:
Hangē ko e fu’u ‘akau,
‘Oku tu’u ta’engaūe ē,
‘O ne fakamalumal
u
,
‘A e fa’ahinga kehekeh
e
.*
